interface.name: locallogin_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute local logins in the local login domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: locallogin_use_fds
interface.summary: Allow processes to inherit local login file descriptors.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: locallogin_dontaudit_use_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to inherit local login file descriptors.

interface.name: locallogin_signull
interface.summary: Send a null signal to local login processes.

interface.name: locallogin_link_keys
interface.summary: Allow link to the local_login key ring.
